title: Calories in Mini Milky Way
meta_description: Discover calories in mini milky way, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard fun-size mini Milky Way bar (~17 g), milk chocolate with nougat and caramel filling.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact size, recipe changes, and manufacturing; check packaging for precise values.

quick_answer.text: One mini Milky Way bar contains about 80 calories and 10 g of sugar.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Eat two mini bars instead of one
Add crushed peanuts (1 tsp per bar)

faqs.q: How many calories in one mini Milky Way?
What are the carbs in mini Milky Way?
faqs.a: About 11.5 g carbs, mostly from sugars (10 g).

faqs.q: Is there fiber in mini Milky Way?
faqs.a: No dietary fiber (0 g) in a standard mini Milky Way.

faqs.q: How much fat is in mini Milky Way?
faqs.a: 3.5 g total fat, including 2.5 g saturated fat per mini bar.

faqs.q: Calories in mini Milky Way vs. full size?
faqs.a: Mini is ~80 kcal; full-size bar is around 210 kcal.
